```{r Package Setup}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
```

```{r Load Data}
train_data <- read.csv(paste0(here::here(), '/Data/df_cleaned.csv'))

# deal with the date column and drop unnecessary columns 
clean_data <- data_set_up(train_data)
```

# GLM
```{r}
# drop the NDF column because we would like to predict the desctinations on a continent basis 
clean_data <- clean_data %>% 
  dplyr::select(-NDF)

glm_mod <- glm(continent_des ~., data = clean_data)

table(clean_data$continent_des)

clean_data %>%
  dplyr::select(continent_des) %>% 
  filter(is.na(continent_des))
```
